duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the development of cell-based methods for potency assessment of drug products as per regulatory guidance and industry standards.
Monitor and establish acceptance criteria for potency evaluation and method performance.
Prepare new and revised SOPs associated with the functions of Analytical testing and analysis of sample testing potency data.
Author reports per regulatory guidance on method development and qualification.
Provide analytical assay execution in support of vaccine process and product development programs.
Provide technical expertise for GLP/GxP requirements or lab support for process improvements.
Review documentation, and propose process improvements affecting quality.

education_certification.credential: Master’s Degree in related field with 1-2 years related industry experience, or a PHD in related field
